title: Season 7 rewards
body: So I don't own graves, but will I still get the skin somehow?

replies.body: Yeah!  If you're eligible for the reward, Graves will unlock along with the skin for you.  ^^
if you are at the end of the season gold + and you have no punishments in recent times,  you will get the graves skin + graves ando the chroma based on your que.
You'll receive graves in addition to the skin.
